casebody.data:
ROBERTS
v.
McALLISTER. No. 686A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 8, 2006. Ingrid K. Friesen, for Michael W. McAllister.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of February 2006 by Plaintiff to Dismiss Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of February 2006."
